title: Do You Have E-Charisma on Zoom? Here’s How to Get It
sub_head: The flair and charm that works for in-person meetings doesn’t come across the same way on a video chat; ‘E-charisma involves a completely different set of skills’
body:
With the rise of working from home, some people accustomed to using their charisma in person have learned a tough lesson: Commanding a room isn’t the same thing as commanding a Zoom.
It comes down to “E-charisma.”
In face-to-face meetings, physical charisma often goes a long way in helping someone get noticed and advance in their career....
